name: Rally Desert Cheese
description:
Rally Desert is a fun simple game where you play the role of a mouse seeking for all the cheese in the desert.

Rules:
Collect all cheese before the time ends
Beware of the fireballs and do not fall of the desert land
Reach level 10 and you are a super mouse!

Controls:
"S" - Start the game
Left/Right Arrow keys - turn
Up/Down Arrow keys - accelerate decelerate Mouse
Space bar - Jump 

Source Code:
https://github.com/scenemax3d/games/tree/master/Rally-Desert-Cheese

This game was written in SceneMax3D - the worlds easiest games programming language
